'''Impromptu Opening''' is [[Xinyan]]'s [[Level 2 Constellation]].

==Gameplay Notes==
*Creating the shield via this Constellation can activate the [[Sacrificial Greatsword]]'s passive.
**However, as there is no hotkey involved, the pseudo-Element Skill does not create Night Stars for [[Layla]]'s [[Nights of Formal Focus]].
